mapper.select: SELECT gb.*, host_user.username AS hostname, -- 방명록 주인의 이름 guest_user.username AS guestname -- 메시지 작성자의 이름 FROM guestbook gb JOIN users host_user ON gb.host_id = host_user.user_id JOIN users guest_user ON gb.guest_id = guest_user.user_id WHERE gb.host_id = #{hostId} ORDER BY gb.created_at DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guestbook (host_id, guest_id, message) values (#{hostId} ,#{guestId}, #{message});
